text: One or multiple nodules on the pinnae and less commonly on the muzzle and periorbital skin , with variably ulcerated , scaled or smooth surfaces ( histology : numerous amastigotes ) [ 76 ] Two cats had recurrent cutaneous leishmaniosis : one was treated with allopurinol , but the skin lesions continued to recur despite treatment ; in three other cats , excisional biopsy was apparently curative , and lesions did not recur during the follow - up period ( 2 - 4 years )
